articles.title: Video Analysis with OCI Vision AI Services & Oracle AI Database 26ai
articles.description: AI-driven video analysis is no longer limited to complex, high-cost solutions.  With Oracle AI Vision Service, developers can harness pre-built machine learning models to analyze videos,  detect objects & text, identify scenes, and extract metadata‚Äîall through simple, scalable APIs.
articles.buttonlabel: Video Analysis with OCI Vision AI

articles.title: Create a Streamlit Python and ReactJS Oracle AI Database Applications for CRUD operations
articles.description: A Step-by-Step Guide to Building a Full-Stack Application. In this article, we'll take you on a journey to build a full-stack application using Oracle Cloud, React.js, and Streamlit. We'll cover everything from setting up the Cockpit web console and monitoring invalid login attempts to creating a simple Streamlit application for CRUD operations on a Customers table.
articles.buttonlabel: Streamlit Python and ReactJS AI Database App

articles.title: How to Install Oracle AI Database 26ai & 23ai on OCI Autonomous Linux
articles.description: A Step-by-Step Guide to Installation and Setup This article provides a comprehensive walkthrough on setting up Oracle Database 23ai Free & Oracle AI Database 26ai from scratch. From creating a Compute Instance and configuring your network to installing SQL Developer and connecting to your database, we'll guide you through every step of the process. Follow along as we explore the world of Oracle Database 23ai, and get ready to unlock the full potential of your data management needs..
articles.buttonlabel: Install Oracle AI Database 26ai & 23ai

articles.title: MCP Toolbox - Write your own MCP Servers and MCP Server with Oracle Generative AI
articles.description: Are you ready to dive into the world of MCP and unlock its full potential? In this hands-on tutorial, we'll take you on a journey to build, deploy, and manage your own MCP servers. From setting up your development environment to deploying on cloud platforms, we'll cover it all. Follow along as we create everything from simple "Hello World" servers to functional calculators, and learn how to integrate MCP with popular tools like Claude desktop. Let's get started and explore the exciting possibilities of MCP! We will also create MCP Server with Oracle Generative AI and integrate that with Claude Desktop.
articles.buttonlabel: MCP Toolbox Write your own MCP Servers

articles.title: Unlocking the Power of Model Context Protocol (MCP) and Oracle Database 23ai
articles.description: n this article, we'll explore the innovative world of Model Context Protocol (MCP) and its seamless integration with Oracle Database 23ai. We'll dive into the exciting possibilities of leveraging MCP to streamline development workflows, enhance productivity, and unlock new insights from your data.
articles.buttonlabel: Power of MCP and Oracle Database 23ai

articles.title: Streamlining Data Migration: Snowflake to Oracle Database 23ai
articles.description: In today's data-driven landscape, organizations are constantly seeking efficient ways to migrate and integrate data across different platforms. Whether it's transitioning from cloud-based data warehouses like Snowflake to robust relational databases such as Oracle Database 23ai, or migrating from NoSQL databases like MongoDB, the process requires careful planning, the right tools, and a deep understanding of data migration architectures.

articles.title: The Future of Intelligent Search: A Comprehensive Guide to RAG AI Agents, Knowledge base and Graph RAG
articles.description: The Future of Intelligent Search: A Comprehensive Guide to RAG AI Agents, Knowledge base and Graph RAG. The rapid advancement of artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the way organizations manage and interact with complex data. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) AI Agents are at the forefront of this revolution, enabling intelligent search, retrieval, and generation capabilities that can unlock new insights and drive business value.
articles.buttonlabel: Future of Intelligent Search: RAG AI Agents

articles.title: A Step-by-Step Guide to Building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Application
articles.description: The world of artificial intelligence is rapidly evolving, and one of the most exciting developments is the emergence of AI agents. These autonomous systems can perceive their environment, take actions, and learn from their experiences, making them incredibly powerful tools for a wide range of applications. In this article, we'll explore the concepts of AI agents, agentic AI, and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and provide a hands-on guide to building a RAG application using Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).
articles.buttonlabel: Building a RAG Application

articles.title: Oracle Globally Distributed Database - Banking Application CRUD Operations using Oracle APEX
articles.description: This article (Part 3/3) covers setting up and demonstrating an Oracle Sharding application with Streamlit python application. Key steps include: Database Setup: Creating application users, tablespaces, and schema for a demo banking application. Data Management: Inserting records into sharded and duplicated tables across different shards.

articles.title: Setup Oracle Globally Distributed Database with RAFT Replication
articles.description: This article covers setting up and configuring Oracle's Globally Distributed Database with RAFT replication. Key steps include: Infrastructure Setup: Creating compute instances and networking using hashtag#Terraform. Environment Preparation: Disabling firewall and setting up SSH connections to compute instances. Enabling and managing RAFT replication, including operations and settings.
articles.buttonlabel: Setup Oracle Globally Distributed Database

articles.title: Oracle Globally Distributed Databases and Sharding concepts
articles.description: This article (Part 1/3) provides an overview of Oracle's Globally Distributed Database, covering its architecture, features, and components. Key topics include: Introduction: Defining  Oracle Globally DistributedDatabase and its benefits. Sharding: Explaining single logical database hashtag#Sharding, automated sharding and resharding, and shard architecture.

articles.title: Migrating Oracle APEX Applications Across Workspaces

Ensure a smooth transition with our step-by-step guide on creating database objects, troubleshooting, and monitoring activity logs.

articles.title: Build a Suspected Transaction Review Business Process with Oracle Integration, Process Automation
articles.description: Designing a Suspected Transaction Review Process: A step-by-step guide to creating a manual review process for suspected transactions, enabling informed approval/rejection decisions based on key parameters. This automation offers numerous benefits, including improved efficiency, enhanced customer experience, increased accuracy, and reduced costs

articles.buttonlabel: How to migrate the MERN stack MongoDB application

articles.title: AI for Healthcare Innovations: How to Build an AI Medical Helper
articles.description: In this article, we will see how to create an AI Medical helper that can take patients' input parameters such as Blood sugar level, or blood glucose level, which refers to the amount of sugar in your blood and also Blood pressure, which is a force of blood pushing against the walls of your arteries. Suppose the patient has a family history of diabetes, smoking habits, exercises regularly, etc., and based on these inputs. It generates a diet plan and exercise plan
articles.buttonlabel: AI for Healthcare Innovations

articles.title: AI for Aviation - Create Realtime Passenger Dashboard with Transactional Event Queues, Advanced Queuing, Scheduler Jobs
articles.description: AI for Aviation. In this article, we will see how Oracle Advanced Queuing and Scheduling Jobs with Oracle Scheduler can help in process automation and smooth run aviation passenger traffic into the airport till passengers board a flight. There are multiple queues such as Immigration check & passport stamping, baggage check-in, security check, etc., and many priorities such as regular passengers, VIP and VVIP passengers, and airport lounge users
articles.buttonlabel: AI for Aviation - Realtime Passenger Dashboard

articles.title: Multicloud Oracle Database@Microsoft Azure - How to create & access Oracle Autonomous Database 23ai on Azure Cloud
articles.description: In this article, we will see how to create an Oracle Autonomous Database @ Microsoft Azure Cloud. We will try the Azure Portal and The Azure Command Line Interface approaches to familiarize ourselves with both. There is a troubleshooting section for common errors that you might come across. Use Azure Copilot to help us debug errors, We will look deeper into the details of creating an Azure Resource Group, Azure virtual network, Create Azure Public IP, Azure Windows Virtual Machine, List various images and Create Bastion Host. Once the environment is available, what are the various options to access these services? These include Data Studio, Microsoft .Net Core Project, Java and Python applications, and more. Multicloud opens up infinite opportunities to leverage the best of both the cloud worlds, Oracle Cloud OCI and Microsoft Azure.
articles.buttonlabel: Multicloud Oracle Database@Microsoft Azure

articles.title: Multicloud Oracle Database@Google Cloud - How to create & access Oracle Autonomous Database 23ai on Google Cloud
articles.description: n this article, we will see how to create Oracle Autonomous Database 23ai instance, Network, Subnets, Firewalls, Windows VMs, Bastion Host, Firewalls, etc., on the Google Cloud platform GPC, leveraging the best of both cloud worlds, Google Cloud, and Oracle Cloud OCI. Oracle Database@Google Cloud gives customers direct access to Oracle database services running on OCI and deployed in Google Cloud data centres. This new offering is designed to help customers accelerate their migration to the cloud so they can modernize their IT environments and take advantage of Google Cloud infrastructure, tooling, and AI services, including data and analytics, Vertex AI, and the company‚Äôs Gemini foundation models.
articles.buttonlabel: Multicloud Oracle Database@Google Cloud

articles.title: AI for Healthcare with Oracle Database 23ai & Its Building Blocks
articles.description: In this article, we will see how to create Oracle Autonomous Database 23ai instance, Network, Subnets, Firewalls, Windows VMs, Bastion Host, Firewalls, etc., on the Amazon Web Services cloud platform AWS, leveraging the best of both cloud worlds, AWS and Oracle Cloud OCI. Oracle Database@AWS gives customers direct access to Oracle database services running on OCI and deployed in AWS data centres. This new offering is designed to help customers accelerate their migration to the cloud so they can modernize their IT environments and take advantage of AWS infrastructure, tooling, and AI services, including data and analytics, Bedrock AI service, and more. This Partnership helps customers simplify cloud migration, Multicloud deployment, and management.
articles.buttonlabel: AI for Healthcare with Oracle Database 23ai

articles.title: LangChain4j LLM framework with Oracle Database 23ai Vector Embedding Store - Fruit Search Java App
articles.description: In this article we will see how to use the LangChain4j LLM framework with Oracle Database 23ai Vector Embedding Store to create a simple fruit search Java application. Fruit details are stored in an Oracle Database embedded vector store, users search queries are looked up in the embedded vector store, and corresponding results (fruit details) are displayed based on natural language processing. A single Java file is used to keep it simple, and the entire application is written from a basic HelloWorld Maven project. We will check and monitor the Docker container logs related to this application.
articles.buttonlabel: LangChain4j with Oracle Database 23ai Vector Embedding Store

articles.title: Sticker Sorcery with Oracle Database 23ai, ReactJs and Node Oracle DB Driver
articles.description: If you have attended a few major events this year, one of the most popular applications was the Design Your Own DeeBee sticker application or Sticker Sorcery with Oracle Database 23ai in the demo booths. This is a different kind of application that's fun to use. It's great to learn where users can create awesome stickers and print, and it uses lots of the latest imaging technology in the background. I thought, let me share my experience of building this application based on Bitmoji Icons theme

articles.title: Oracle Generative AI for the Motion pictures & Print Media Industry
articles.description: There are so many Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI service providers today that choosing what's best can also be another challenge with Generative AI and the physical hardware and infrastructure required to run these LLMs. In this article, we will use Oracle Generative AI, LangChain, and Streamlit to generate a movie script. Based on this script, we will generate AI images using HuggingFace Image generation models and stable diffusion. We will also compare various models and see the generated output.

articles.title: Creating a RAG-Based Chatbot with Internal PDFs and Oracle Database Tables
articles.description: In this article, we will explore how to create a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) based chatbot using internal PDFs and Oracle Database tables. We will cover the key steps involved in setting up the chatbot, integrating it with Oracle Database, and training the AI model to provide accurate responses based on the provided data sources.

articles.title: How to work with LangChain and Oracle Generative AI
articles.description: In this article, we will learn how to work with #LangChain's open-source building blocks, components & #LLMs integrations, #Streamlit, an open-source #Python framework for #DataScientists and AI/ML engineers and #OracleGenerativeAI to build the next generation of Intelligent Applications. We will do the groundwork of setting up the OCI Command line interface, Creating a simple LangChain app, writing an interactive #Healthcare application, and creating a search application that can scan through a training #PDF document.
articles.buttonlabel: How to work with LangChain and Oracle Generative AI

articles.title: Working with Oracle Container Engine for Kubernetes (OKE) Microservices and Dockers
articles.description: In this article, we will create an Oracle Container Engine for hashtag#KubernetesCluster hashtag#OKE with 3 Nodes, understand some of the Kubernetes concepts such as Namespace, PODS, Deployments, High Availability, Micro Services , View and monitor Logs of PODs, create an OKE deployment from a Docker repository. Expose a service through Oracle LoadBalancer, Create Tomcat and Nginx services on Kubernetes, Create a PHP and Redis Kubernetes Service on OKE and access it through a Load Balancer, use the same code example of an Application that runs on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) on Oracle Container Engine for Kubernetes Cluster OKE
articles.buttonlabel: Container Engine for Kubernetes, Microservices and Dockers

articles.title: Spatial and Generative AI for Travel and Hospitality Industry
articles.description: In this article we will search for UNESCO sites based on the travel destinations. Using Oracle Spatial location intelligence from the selected UNESCO site, we will search for other UNESCO sites nearby within a radius of say 10 km or 100 km - so that, as a traveller, we can visit the nearest place. We will also leverage Oracle Generative AI to learn more about the selected UNESCO site and find the nearest, cheapest and best Airbnb accommodation around the UNESCO site. We will also see how we can find our location data and find nearest UNESCO sites around us based on distance.
articles.buttonlabel: Spatial and Generative AI for Travel Industry

articles.title: Oracle Database 23c cool & essential features
articles.description: Oracle Database 23c is the next long-term support release of Oracle Database. Oracle Database 23c code named  App Simple, accelerates Oracle's mission to make it simple to develop and run all data-driven applications. It's the sum of all the features from the Oracle Database 21c innovation release plus over 300 new features and enhancements. Key focus areas include JSON, graphs, Microservices, and developer productivity.
articles.buttonlabel: Oracle Database 23c cool & essential features

articles.title: How to build intelligent applications using Oracle Generative AI and Oracle APEX
articles.description: In this article will show a hands-on approach to building AI-driven innovative applications using #OracleGenerativeAI services and low code #OracleAPEX Applications. We will test our AI model with questions related to Neurology, Weather conditions, Writing emails, Generating Java code, Generating SQL, or even how to make mixed fruit jam. The Oracle #AILanguage Translation Service can easily translate these AI response texts into various languages.

We can also translate the output of an AI service (Cohere, OpenAI or Oracle Generative AI) into any desired language supported by the AI service.

DBMS_CLOUD_AI package facilitates and configures the translation of natural language prompts to SQL statements. Oracle #APEX helps create a user interface for accepting user inputs and displaying AI results. Use Oracle Machine Learning #OML notebooks to run some of the Select AI SQLs.

These chatbots with #OracleDigitalAssistant are super smart and can be game-changers. They can accept users' questions on chat, understand intent, and convert them into SQL statements and query databases to deliver the result in the web chatbot or mobile chatbot app or Oracle #APEX Application.

Optionally setup #FTP Server and #Cockpit GUI for OEL Administration

articles.title: Working with Oracle APEX and Oracle Analytics Cloud platform

articles.buttonlabel: SSO with Oracle APEX and Oracle Analytics Cloud

articles.title: Working with JSON-Relational Duality Views and Oracle APEX
articles.description: JSON-relational duality views combine the advantages of using JSON documents with the advantages of the relational model, while avoiding the limitations of each. With duality views, the only objects you map to relational data are JSON documents. You could say that a duality view is a document-relational mapping (DRM), or a JSON-relational mapping (JRM).
articles.buttonlabel: JSON-Relational Duality Views and Oracle APEX

articles.title: How to Integrate Google Cloud YouTube APIs with Oracle APEX Applications

It may be challenging to run analytics on how many views, likes and comments on each of those videos to get a total engagement level on these YouTube videos. Most likely, You will focus on your future content with higher views and engagement levels rather than the one that no one wants to see.
articles.buttonlabel: Integrate Google Cloud YouTube APIs with Oracle APEX
